meanings.definition: Nymphs in Greek mythology who are associated with trees and forests.
meanings.sent1: The dryads danced gracefully among the tall trees.
meanings.sent2: The ancient story spoke of dryads living in harmony with nature.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dryads played hide-and-seek with the woodland creatures.
meanings.sent4: The forest seemed to whisper secrets known only to the ethereal dryads.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations in the book brought the mystical dryads to life.

meanings.definition: A group of dryads living in the ancient oak tree.
meanings.sent1: The old oak tree sheltered a community of dryads within its trunk.
meanings.sent2: Legends told of a powerful bond between the oak tree and its resident dryads.
meanings.sent3: The dryads held a festive celebration under the moonlit sky.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the oak tree swayed gently, cradling the sleeping dryads.
meanings.sent5: The villagers whispered tales of the magical dryads dwelling in the ancient oak.
